categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Clipper was a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle that saw service with the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War at the Battle on the Frontier.
The Clipper participated in the Third Battle of the Pakuuni system and was destroyed in the battle, likely by Maarek Stele.
Clipper appears on Star Wars: TIE Fighter on Battle 3 Mission 6, but will only appear on the hardest difficulty.
